ARABIC: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then I seized hold of those who were kafir and how absolute was My rejection!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We seized the unbelievers. How great was the change I wrought in their condition then!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then I seized those who denied the Truth, and how terrible was My punishment!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: so I seized the unbelievers and how terrible was their torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then I seized the disbelievers; so how did denial My rejection turn out?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then I took hold of those who disbelieved, and how terrible was My denial!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then did I punish those who disbelieved, so how was the manifestation of My disapproval?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then I seized the unbelievers, and how was My horror!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then seized I those who disbelieved, and how intense was My abhorrence!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but in the end I seized those who were bent on denying the truth and how terrible was My punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then I took hold of those who disbelieved. So how terrible was My disapproval!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then I seized the faithless. So how was My rebuttal!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In the end did I punish those who rejected Faith: and how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then I took hold of those who disbelieved, and how terrible was My denial (punishment)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then I seized those who disbelieved, and how was My rejection!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then I seized those who disbelieved—so how was My rejection?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [35:26] Then I seized those who disbelieved, for their denial, and how was My abhorrence!, [how was] My rebuttal   against them by way of punishment and destruction, in other words, it was appropriate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then seized I) then I punished (those who disbelieved) in the Scriptures and messengers, (and how intense was My abhorrence!) see, Muhammad, how I turned against them with chastisement when they rejected faith.
